generated_body: In reading the article titled "17 restaurants that will be open on Thanksgiving," the user is likely to expect a detailed list of dining options available on Thanksgiving Day. The article may provide insights into various types of cuisine, ranging from traditional holiday meals to unique offerings at different establishments. Additionally, the article is likely to address the convenience of dining out during the holiday, especially for those who prefer not to cook.
